dcterms:creator: Yujing Hu
Qing Da
Anxiang Zeng
Yang Yu
Yinghui Xu
dcterms:description: This dataset is based on the RecSys Challenge 2015 and is session-based, containing sequences of clicks and purchases. Sessions with fewer than 3 interactions were removed, resulting in a subset of 200,000 sessions.
dcterms:title: RC15

dcterms:description: This dataset is collected from a real-world e-commerce website and contains session events of viewing and adding to cart. Views are treated as clicks and adding to cart as purchases. Items interacted with fewer than 3 times and sequences shorter than 3 were removed.
dcterms:title: RetailRocket
